betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§o*insert black&white paper gif*§r

Obtaining paper is both more difficult and less efficient than in vanilla.

You will need to grind §aSugar Canes§r into §aChad§r, and then press it with a mallet and water.

§9Note 1:§r The bucket is not consumed. You can use other fluid containers in the recipe, like Wooden Barrels, to make this easier.

§9Note 2:§r Make a Sugar Cane manual farm.

§9Note 3:§r As a reminder, Bone Meal can be used on Sugar Canes.

§9Note 4:§r In LV Age, you will be able to make Paper from Wood, if you want more.

§9Note 5:§r The Crafting Station makes this microcrafting absolutely trivial, use it!

§9Note 6:§r Paper will be used as a poor wrapping material for the upcoming resistors.

§9Note 7:§r I have a pleasure to share this moment with you, fellow Greg enjoyer.

§9Note 8:§r If you didn't notice the meme reference in the quest title and the italics... Nothing will happen, let's move on.
